name: Evolution: Indian Hunter - Unlimited
description:
Evolution: Indian Hunter – Unlimited

The complete version of our 3D adventure game as a gift for children!

-No more in-app sales, to the relief of their parents.
-No additional costs.
-Everything is included in this version.

-Weapons, skills, all levels!-

Over the span of 12 levels, the player, as Chayton, the young son of the tribal chief, ventures out to experience the prairie and the perils of the wilderness.

(A further 6 levels are already in development and we will provide them for free as well in an update.)

- It’s off to the buffalo hunt together with Chayton’s father Akecheta; the weapons are tomahawks, spears, bows and arrows.

- The player as Chayton must learn to approach animals stealthily, taking care that they don’t sense his presence too early.

- There are audio sequences in the authentic Lakota language, and at useful moments the game displays interesting background information about the life of the Indians, the plants, and animal world.

- Experience history playfully, with emotion, danger, and suspense – many adventures await you!

- With its nomination for this year’s TOMMI 2013 (German Children’s Game Award) Evolution: Indian Hunter has already made a name for itself.

- Perfect for long winter evenings or the journey into your ski holidays.

EXPERIENCE A NEW WORLD AND LOOK THROUGH THE EYES OF THE HUNTER!
